channel.title: TokkulScape V3.5 (MezzyScape) Client Error
channel.description:
Hey, I just downloaded the TokkulScape 3.5 Client and tried to run (didnt edit anything) and I recieve an error. It probally aint big but Im new to 508's only been using 317 so any help is appreciated.
This is the error recieved when running the client:
[code](Server Name) 508 Client! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2009, 05:25:33 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post but really? Someone help? 32 people read this and nobody can help..

item.title: TokkulScape V3.5 (MezzyScape) Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Manu0238 Manu0238
item.description:
@Manu0238 wrote:

the mezzyscape client does not have a anti-leech…
I changed the name and the loading message without any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: TokkulScape V3.5 (MezzyScape) Client Error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This shows up when your try to Leech the client.
If you try to change the name of the title or such…

This pops up, re extract it.
